14.heading: Colletta, Vince, 1926-
14.title: "The Black Lama!"
14.author: Mike Friedrich, writer & George Tuska, artist ; additional pencils by Jim Starlin ; inks by Vince Colletta ; lettering by Artie Simek
notes: SUMMARY: Iron Man struggles with Raga, Son of Fire, whose master The Black Lama describes training Raga to be part of his "world-wide web" of pupils, then deserts him as a failed pupil, so that although the Black Lama is on a separate mystic plane and Iron Man cannot touch him, Iron Man is victorious. I. [Each creator] II. Iron Man. k. Lamas. k. Raga, Son of Fire. k. Masters. k. World-Wide Webs. k. Pupils. k. Mystic Planes. Call no.: PN6728.3.M3I7no.53
